message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.CE 

The paper discusses a reinforcement learning framework and its application in various fields such as online rank elicitation, information retrieval, search engine improvement, and clinical online recommendation. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories such as machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), information retrieval (cs.IR), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), and computational engineering, finance, and science (cs.CE). Among these, machine learning and artificial intelligence seem to be the most likely sub-categories as the paper proposes a new method for solving a multi-armed bandit problem, which is a common problem in these fields.
